scripts.build:cli: tsup cli.ts --outDir ../../dist/evals --format cjs && cp evals.config.json ../../dist/evals/ && chmod +x ../../dist/evals/cli.js
scripts.e2e: pnpm run build && playwright test --config deterministic/e2e.playwright.config.ts
scripts.e2e:bb: pnpm run build && playwright test --config deterministic/bb.playwright.config.ts
scripts.e2e:local: pnpm run build && playwright test --config deterministic/local.playwright.config.ts
